mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GUEST (first_name, last_name, nick_name, phone, email, encrypted_password, birth, country_code) VALUES (#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{nickName}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{encryptedPassword}, #{birth}, #{countryCode})
mapper.select: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, nick_name, phone, email, encrypted_password,auth_status, birth, country_code,count_monthly_stamp, count_coupon, created_at, updated_at FROM GUEST WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, first_name, last_name, nick_name, phone, email, encrypted_password,auth_status, birth, country_code,count_monthly_stamp, count_coupon, created_at, updated_at FROM GUEST WHERE email = #{email}

SELECT id, first_name, last_name, nick_name, phone, email, encrypted_password,auth_status, birth, country_code,count_monthly_stamp, count_coupon, created_at, updated_at FROM GUEST ORDER BY created_at DESC
